ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when the akhira is better and longer lasting.

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: but the Everlasting Life is better, and more enduring.

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [87:17] whereas the Hereafter, and the Paradise it entails, is better and more lasting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Although the Hereafter) striving for the Hereafter and the reward of the Hereafter (is better) than striving for the life of the world and reward of the life of the world (and more lasting.
